definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
troop arrangement/battle formation/lineup (of a sports team etc)
to improve one's appearance (using cosmetics or cosmetic surgery)/to make oneself more attractive/to beautify
to hold/to contain/to accommodate/to tolerate (different opinions)

sentences.english: Hong Kong TVB actress Yung Mei Ling was discovered dead at her home yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 香港無線電視演員容美玲被發現死在家裏昨天。

sentences.english: All her lovely companions are faded and gone;
sentences.chinese: 所有可愛的伴侶，無復舊時容。

sentences.english: Zhou Youping face the same good behavior, and the lady is no different.
sentences.chinese: 周友平面容姣好，行爲舉止，與淑女無異。

sentences.english: So now, please let your servants settle in Goshen.
sentences.chinese: 現在求你容僕人住在歌珊地。

sentences.english: It completely belongs to Chinese internal affair and tolerates no foreign interference to solving Taiwa…
sentences.chinese: 解決臺灣問題純屬中國內政，絕不容別國干涉。

sentences.english: DDP will be administered and patient caregivers, as appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 醫將接受鉑治療患者患者照者適候討論容。
英雄可以容或者大義凜然。

sentences.english: It's really a tough chose if I am Rong.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是容，我也會很難抉擇。

sentences.english: And he discovered Yung Mei Ling sprawled on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他發現容美玲攤開在地板上。

sentences.english: Dan you can a can as a canner can can a can?
sentences.chinese: 你可以容或像罐頭工人同樣裝罐頭嗎？

sentences.english: The paper introduces the VVVF control method for single phase capacitor motor.
sentences.chinese: 介紹單相電容電機變頻調速的控制方法。

sentences.english: The article may have some inappropriate parts, please correct them.
sentences.chinese: 這份稿件容或有不當之處，望請您多指正。

sentences.english: Then the man said, "Let me go, for it is daybreak."
sentences.chinese: 那人說，天黎明瞭，容我去吧。

sentences.english: But to be perfectly frank, we doubt that Lu herself is above Blue vs. Green political considerations.
sentences.chinese: 但是，容我們直言，呂恐怕也未必能夠完全超越藍綠。

sentences.english: It is easy to swim if another holds up your head.
sentences.chinese: 有人扶着頭，容易學游泳。

sentences.english: Draw the wind and hold the various schools of thinkers' head, there are one's own unique artistic styles.
sentences.chinese: 畫風容百家之長，並有自己獨特的藝術風格。

definition: to belittle/to look down upon/to despise
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
